name: Folletto
description:
In this 3 level game (plus a couple easy tutorial levels) you will need to collect explosive crystal shards, place them in an asteroid and then away on board of a spaceship.

commands are: space bar to move forward, left and right arrows to rotate the character and Q to get hints on the current objective.

WARNING!

This game is not complete, it is just a prototype, so there are missing assets and features. Altough it is playable.
